Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 47th/Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, Oakwood and Lake Shore Drive due to, street blockage near 47th/Lake Shore Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, Oakwood and Lake Shore Drive due to, street blockage near 47th/Lake Shore Dr.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Eastbound Reroute at 31st/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: EB 35 31st/35th buses temp. rerouted via 35th, Rhodes, 33rd Pl, Cottage Grove, & into 35th as a terminal, due to street blockage near 31st/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: No trains between Linden and Howard
ShortDescription: Purple Line service has been temporarily suspended between Linden and Howard due to a mechanical problem on a train.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line service has been temporarily suspended between Linden and Howard due to a mechanical problem on a train.

As a result, trains are operating only between Linden and Howard at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Linden and Howard to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
